docs.lead_paragraph: They started living together because she didn't want to live alone in New York, they were spending all their time together anyway, and it seemed crazy to pay two rents "You know how it is," she said "It's so disorienting,
docs.abstract: Amy Gross article on marriage counseling for unwed couples; drawing (L)
